title: The largest lakes in the U.S. in 2003 , by area
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Area in square miles for 20 number of Lakes In The Uss.
The Area in square miles is appeared to be the highest at Lakes In The Us Lake Superior and lowest at Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake.
The difference of Area in square miles between the highest and lowest Lakes In The Us is 31355.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Lakes In The Us in the x axis and Area in square miles in the y axis.
The Area in square miles is appeared to be the highest at Lakes In The Us Lake Superior and lowest at Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Area in square miles for 20 number of Lakes In The Uss.
The Area in square miles is appeared to be the highest at Lakes In The Us Lake Superior and lowest at Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake.
The difference of Area in square miles between the highest and lowest Lakes In The Us is 31355.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Area in square miles for 20 number of Lakes In The Uss.
The Area in square miles is highest at Lakes In The Us Lake Superior and lowest at Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake.
Second maximum Area in square miles is found at Lakes In The Us Lake Huron.
Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake has 91.88 times less Area in square miles than Lakes In The Us Lake Superior which is the highest.
Area in square miles at Lakes In The Us Lake Superior is 31700.0 , second place is Lake Huron at 23000.0, and thirdly is Lake Michigan at 22300.0.
Considered together, the average Area in square miles in all 20 Lakes In The Uss is roughly 5232.65.
